sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均含有"高声地，大声地"之意。
means: aloud ：强调出声，能让人听见，无比较级。用于修饰cry, call, shout等动词时，有高声之意。
loud ：指声音响亮，高声说话，一般放在所修饰的动词后面。
loudly与loud含义相同，可放在动词之前或之后，用以说明声音的强度，含"喧闹"的意味。

sentence.Network_en: Prue entered the passage in her notebook, then read it aloud again.
sentence.Network_cn: 普吕把那一段写在她的笔记本上，然后又大声念了一遍。

sentence.Network_en: Prudently, Joanna spoke none of this aloud.
sentence.Network_cn: 出于慎重，乔安娜说这些话时一直压低声音。

(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... almost ad. 几乎，差不多 aloud ad. 出声地，大声地 alphabet n. 字母表，字母系统.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... a-/an- == 加强意义 aloud 高声地 aright 正确地.
初中英语词汇手册 - 豆丁网 ... along prep. 沿着 aloud adv. 大声的 already adv. 已经.

list.abs: 字典中念字的解释 ... (3) 同“廿”。二十[ twenty] (1) 诵读,按字读出声[ read aloud] (2) 同本义[ miss].
think的短语_百度知道 ... think a lot of 喜欢; 尊敬 think aloud 自言自语 think and think 细想.
出声思维定义： 出声思维（think aloud）：是思维的另一个研究方法。让被试在问题解决或推理的过程中，将其思路用言语报告出 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from a-(expressing manner) + loud

entry.def: When you say something, read, or laugh aloud, you speak or laugh so that other people can hear you.

example.ex: When we were children, our father read aloud to us...
example.tran: 我们小的时候，父亲会给我们朗读。

entry.tran: 说话不加思索；说话不经大脑
entry.def: If you think aloud, you express your thoughts as they occur to you, rather than thinking first and then speaking.

example.ex: He really must be careful about thinking aloud. Who knew what he might say?
example.tran: 他的确该注意自己说话不经思索的问题。谁知道他会说些什么？

sentences.sentence: "he spoke loud enough for those at the back of the room to hear him"

auth_sentence.content: Here he picked up the book and read aloud again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here he picked up the book and read aloud again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here he picked up the book and read aloud again.

auth_sentence.content: He was happily whiling away the evenings by reading aloud.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was happily whiling away the evenings by reading aloud.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was happily whiling away the evenings by reading aloud.

auth_sentence.content: I was tactless enough to mutter aloud at the desecration.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was tactless enough to mutter aloud at the desecration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was tactless enough to mutter aloud at the desecration.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 加在单词前,表示"在……,……的"; 2. 注:加在描述性的动词前面表形容词,常用作表语;加在名词,形容词前构成副词.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+shore岸→adv.向岸地, 在岸上地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在远处, 到远处, 离去
stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……,……的+way路→沿着路去了远方

jushi.english: A man has the right to think aloud to his wife.
jushi.chinese: 一个人总该有权和自己的妻子谈谈心吧。

jushi.english: He practises reading aloud every morning.
